message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product.  Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.  I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the unique features of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $900,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  I'm confident that at this price, you'll quickly see a return on your investment.

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
